review_title: Nice work environment with a friendly team.
job_title: Communication Assistant in Merelbeke, East Flanders
pros:
As an employee you have a lot of advantages. 
The level of healthcare is really high. 
Teamwork. 
You get many chances to educate yourself even more. 
Very new and good infrastructure. 
Easy to go to with a car, bike and/or public transport
cons:
You are left with a feeling the management does not appreciate your knowledge. They make you feel your ideas do not matter. 
Very big hierarchy.
